channel.title: [help]Making npcs talk
channel.description:
well somebody told me to look for "moo" in npchandler but i have nothing in there Can anyone take a code out of their npchandler because im only aloud 1 source per time(it takes too much space) Please i will provide you with REP++ when i may get rep because i am nearly finished my new designs of god armor
Thanks guys

item.title: [help]Making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:
@mod_jesus wrote:

how to change in 508

open NPCOption1.java
then search if(pnp.npcType == npc id)

then u can change heres a code for it

if(pnp.npcType == 1)
{
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9785, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 1, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “put the message here”, 241, 4)

Read full topic

item.title: [help]Making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“mod jesus, post:5, topic:318632”][quote author=noobspure50 link=topic=415088.msg3055201#msg3055201 date=1260400258]
basically
search this in npchandler

					npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();

then under it add

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random(30) == 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "what u want it to say!"; } }
change the npc id to the npc of your choice
[/quote]

if its 508 dont follow this lol for 508 its diff[/quote]
he didnt specify what it was =\

Read full topic

item.title: [help]Making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if its for a 317 here

if (npcs.npcType == 81) {//npc id if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "moo"; //text }
noobspure50 posted when i was finding my code…
